title: Rammus Change
body:
Would it be too much to change his W, Defensive Ball Curl, from bonus armor and magic resist to % damage reduction and a small AD boost so he doesnt lose any AD with it?

For example, going from 40/60/80/100/120 armor and magic resist to 25/30/35/40/45% damage reduction and 10/15/20/25/30 attack damage.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=OhOkYea,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1sdEwnxB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-11T13:31:23.192+0000)
>
> Why?

I was asking if Armor/Magic Pen should be able to negate the defenses.
No, only item that would is bc. Also I believe his passive effects his total armor.
